volumeInfo.description: For courses in physical geology and introduction to geology This ninth edition of Essentials of Geology offers completely updated material and an extensively revised design, yet retains the hallmarks instructors have come to expect from Lutgens and Tarbuck - a student-friendly writing style, outstanding illustrations by Dennis Tasa that are both geologically accurate and visually appealing, and updated coverage of the most recent geologic events. - Comprehensive coverage of introductory geology - Provides students with strong technical explanations and logical, easy-to-follow discussions. - Written to be understood - Uses non-technical language and frequent headings and sub-headings to enable students at all levels to follow discussions, identify important points in each chapter, and comprehend larger ideas. - Art the teaches and motivates - Provide students with art that acts as a clear and useful learning device. - Carefully crafted illustrations by Dennis Tasa. - Special-interest boxes
volumeInfo.title: Essentials of Geology
